name: Reader Rabbit - 1st Grade
description:
Why is raingear raining down on Wordville? Journey with Reader Rabbit and Sam the Lion up to Cloud Nine to sort out the meteorlogical mystery!

• Multiple difficulty levels for each mini-game that can be changed at any time.
• Full video cutscenes and voice acting throughout the game.
• Simple controls using the Wii Remote.

Educational mini-games designed to teach basic 1st Grade skills, including Language Arts, Science, Problem Solving, Math & Creative Exploration & Expression.
